project.name: Airbnb Planner Multi-Agent Example
project.description:
Spring AI A2A multi-agent example demonstrating THREE integration patterns: 1. Local SubAgents (in-process ChatClient) - research, calculator 2. A2A Remote Agents (HTTP/A2A protocol) - accommodation 3. MCP Tools (stdio protocol) - weather
Features: - Unified SubAgent delegation via auto-configuration - Transparent routing (local vs remote) - Simplified SpringAIAgentExecutor API - Zero boilerplate agent development - Configuration-driven setup (application.yml)
